title: Azur Like It
description: Dreaming of turning her dead-end job at the local paper into fame and fortune at one of London's famed newspapers, reporter Kate Clegg suddenly finds herself unemployed, thanks to shady billionaire Peter Hardstone, until Hardstone's handsome son, Nat, offers her a chance to cover the glamorous Cannes Film Festival. By the author of Gossip Hound. Original.
author: Wendy  Holden
